definition[0]: a unit for measuring liquid, equal to two pints. In Britain this is 1.14 litres, and in the US it is 0.95 litres.
definition[1]: a unit of measure for liquids and some dry goods such as grain or coffee, equal to 1.136 litres
definition[2]: a unit of measure for liquids and some dry goods, equal to 0.946 litres
